repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The User note glued over the guard folio mentions the title and other related inforamtion about the text. It mentions- Marīcipaṭala Vaikhānasāgama Marīci Grantha 88 pages 6 lines Incomplete 44. 233 folio are missing. Thin palm leaf guard folio looks added later than the manuscript folio. Front guard folio has something scribbled in Granth script. on 234v in the left margin is written ekavimatasvaparvamuktyāpāhanaṃ

msItem.title: Marīcipaṭala
msItem.incipit:
234v 1 hayāmitisaṃgrāvyāpāhayedakṣiṇe devīṃ siyaṃ vāme hariṇimityāvāhyadevaṃ (gap of 4 syllables, space left blank.) padiṣaddevān brahṃāṇaṃ śaṃkaraṃ pujakamu
234v 2 niścāvāhyagargālaye kautukāddakṣiṇe vāme vā mukhamandapandakṣiṇe vāme vāstavato āsavañca
msItem.explicit:
263r 3 ādhyānasārattyātvat pratimāmam stāpyarccayet tāmu? (illegible 1) cca tameva kāryam na smārjati coditaṃ paramametajñānayogajñātvā
263r 4 samācaredityāha mariciḥ ..

support.p: Thin palm leaf guard folio, newer than the manuscript folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: sometimes unreadable but big broad characters.

listBibl.bibl: Śrīmadvaikhānase śrīmaharṣimarīcipraṇītānandādi saṃhitāmahāśāstre Srīvimānārcanākalpaḥ niravadhika śrīharigurubhaktibhareṇa sākṣātkṛta śrīmadveṃkaṭācalādhīśena saha divyākṣakrīḍāeasa viśeṣāsvādanaikatānāntaḥkaraṇānāṃ virāgikulasārvabhaumānāṃ śrīsvāmihāthīrāmajī guruvaryāṇāṃ srīmaddivyasaṃhāsanam alaṅkurvāṇaiḥ Śrīśeṣācala śrīpādapura śrīśukapurādivilasaṣchrībhagavaddivyālaya śrī kāryanirvahaṇadhurīṇaiḥ virāgikulaśirobhūṣaṇaiḥ śrīprayāgadāsajī samabhikhyaiḥ śrīmahantavaryaiḥ vaikhānasa-vyākaraṇapaṇḍita, va raghunāthacakravarti bhaṭṭācāryeṇa ca saudhayotvā śrī śrīnivāsabhagavaddivya bhāṇḍāgāroddhṛta draviṇena chennapuryām (madarāsa)bhaktavarya śrī raṅganāthaśreṣṭhivaryāṇāṃ śrīveṅkaṭeśvara mudraṇālaye mudrāpitaḥ 1926

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
